data.title: Robert Redford: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Robert Redford: Check out the list of all Robert Redford movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Robert Redford news on Times of India.
data.text:
Bryce Dallas talks about starting her career as a director, says, "...it's as important to me as acting"

ANI / Feb 04, 2024, 16:27 (IST)

Bryce Dallas Howard, recognized for her diverse acting roles, is forging a parallel career as a filmmaker, emphasizing that directing holds equal importance for her as acting. Alongside her acting career, she has directed the documentary "Dads" and episodes of renowned series like "The Mandalorian" and "The Book of Boba Fett." Drawing inspiration from industry stalwarts like Robert Redford and Jon Favreau, she admires her father Ron Howard's successful transition from acting to directing. Howard actively seeks to balance both roles in her career, leveraging her experiences shadowing her father on set and collaborating with special effects teams. Her curiosity and eagerness to learn on set have been welcomed, fostering an inclusive environment where her feedback is valued. Her latest project, "Argylle," directed by Matthew Vaughn, showcases her dedication to learning and contributing positively to the filmmaking process. Embracing every opportunity in the industry, she prioritizes gaining experience over pursuing perfection in her journey.

Rege-Jean Page, Glen Powell to headline 'Butch Cassidy & The Sundance Kid'-inspired series

PTI / Sep 16, 2022, 17:34 (IST)

'Bridgerton' alum Rege-Jean Page and 'Top Gun: Maverick' star Glen Powell are set to lead a series inspired by the classic Hollywood western movie 'Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid' for a popular OTT platform. The project hails from AGBO, the production banner owned by Joe and Anthony Russo who directed Page in their summer blockbuster 'The Gray Man'.

Priyanka Chopra turns a year older: 8 times she made India proud

ANI / Jul 18, 2022, 10:19 (IST)

Priyanka Chopra is one of the biggest stars in the country. Over the past few years, she has represented India on the global platform and has carved her own place in Hollywood.

I consider myself on my last leg: Brad Pitt hints at retirement

PTI / Jun 23, 2022, 13:41 (IST)

Hollywood star Brad Pitt has dropped a major hint that he might soon be calling quits on his acting career after spending more than 30 years in the entertainment industry. The Oscar-winning actor told in a profile interview that he is going through the "last semester or trimester" of his career.

Dan Stevens on 'Gaslit': Fun exploring real catalog of idiots involved

PTI / Apr 28, 2022, 14:51 (IST)

Dan Stevens says his new Watergate drama 'Gaslit' tries to look at people other than former US president Richard Nixon as well as journalists Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein to present stories of individuals whose lives were turned upside down by the scandal.

'Hooked on a Feeling' singer B.J. Thomas passes away at 78

AP / May 30, 2021, 11:38 (IST)

B.J. Thomas, the Grammy-winning singer who enjoyed success on the pop, country and gospel charts with such hits as 'I Just Can't Help Believing,' 'Raindrops Keep Fallin' On My Head' and 'Hooked on a Feeling,' has passed away. He was 78.

Ohio's lieutenant governor digs in heels on 'Wuhan virus' tweet

AP / Mar 31, 2021, 23:17 (IST)

Ohio's lieutenant governor dug in his heels Wednesday on a tweet in which he referred to Covid-19 as the "Wuhan virus," even as advocates warn such rhetoric is a driving force behind violence against Asian Americans, including the recent attacks in Georgia and New York.
